headline: Will Lennar's (LEN) CEO Consolidation Reshape Its Long-Term Strategy and Execution?
summary: Lennar Corporation recently announced that President and Co-Chief Executive Officer Jon Jaffe will retire at the end of 2025 after a 42-year tenure, with Executive Chairman Stuart Miller set to take on the CEO role and no immediate plans to fill Jaffe's position. This leadership change marks a significant shift for the company, given Jaffe’s longstanding influence on Lennar’s operational focus and expansion trajectory. We will examine how the consolidation of CEO responsibilities under...
